actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

official_title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for an additional place of holding court in the Southern District of Ohio.

summary.text: Amends the Federal judicial code to provide for holding court for the Eastern Division of the Southern District of Ohio in St. Clairsville in addition to Columbus (current law).

titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for an additional place of holding court in the Southern District of Ohio.
